wikipedia_page.main: Ben James Herbert "Bert" Burridge (11 March 1898 – 22 December 1977) was an English footballer who made 124 appearances in the Football League for Darlington, Sheffield Wednesday and Oldham Athletic in the 1920s and 1930s. He played as a half-back – at wing half in the early part of his career, and at centre half later on – and could also play as a forward.
